articles.title: Apple’s Self Service Repair now includes the M1 MacBook Air and MacBook Pro - The Verge
articles.description: You can repair an M1 MacBook Air or MacBook Pro laptop at home using some of the same parts and tools used by Apple stores and its authorized repair providers. It will expand to Europe and support more Macs later this year.
articles.content:
A $49 rental kit lets you swap out the logic board or Touch ID sensor on a MacBook Air or MacBook Pro
Photo by Alexander Kramer for The Verge
